column2: This is the government of Gods. The only real rulers are the Gods. Humanity is futile.
Use godly powers to heal the mind.
Curse this person with a terrible sickness.
This person has been granted a blessing by a god!
This person has been granted a blessing by the gods.
Revoke your blessing from this person.
This person has been chosen by god and granted great power!
Make this person your divine chosen!
Revoke this person as your divine chosen!
This person has been cursed by god.
Smite this person with a terrible curse!
Revoke your terrible curse from this person.
Use divine powers to teleport this person out of prison!
Use divine powers to teleport this person to your court!
Forge a powerful and magical armor for this mortal to use!
Forge a powerful and magical sword for this mortal to use!
Assist as a God to lend your power in the war!
Forged by the Gods, this armor gives the kind and gentle soul the power to banish darkness!
Forged by the Gods, this armor gives the corrupt soul the immortal power to banish the light!
Forged by the Gods, this sword was meant to fight the darkness!
Forged by the Gods, this sword was meant to banish the light!
Forge a powerful and magical armor for a mortal.
Forge a powerful and magical sword for a mortal.
